TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormMethod extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 將表單的送出類型指定為 GET 或 POST 要求。

span.span: Specifies the type of submission for a form as a GET or POST request.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉型別會表示如何會送出表單。The enumeration represents how you will submit a form. 將 GET 要求，當表單的屬性設定為`Get`，限制可以張貼的資料量。A GET request, when the property of the form is set to `Get`, is limited in the amount of data it can post. 使用 GET 要求時，某些回傳類型可能會失敗。Some types of postbacks might fail when using a GET request. 使用 GET 要求的優點是，所有參數都指定為 URL 的一部分，並且您可以快取或儲存 URL。The advantage of using a GET request is that all the parameters are specified as part of the URL, and you can cache or save the URL.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FormMethod Get = int32(0)

summary.span: 使用 GET 要求送出表單。

span.span: Uses a GET request to submit a form.

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。
